briefTitle: First-In-Human Study to Investigate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of ALT-100

interventions.name: ALT-100
interventions.description: intravenous infusion of drug substance diluted in 0.9% normal sterile saline

interventions.name: Normal Saline
interventions.description: intravenous infusion of placebo (0.9% normal sterile saline)

briefTitle: Study of Safety and Efficacy of ALT-100mAb in Participants With Moderate/Severe ARDS

interventions.name: ALT-100 mAb
interventions.description: Experimental: Part A : ALT-100 mAB (Dose Escalation) 90 eligible participants will be randomized at a 2:1 ratio to receive a single dose of ALT-100 mAb.

interventions.name: ALT-100 (Placebo)
interventions.description: Normal saline solution via IV solution

briefTitle: Safety, Tolerability, and Efficacy of Anti-Spike (S) SARS-CoV-2 Monoclonal Antibodies for Hospitalized Adult Patients With COVID-19

interventions.name: REGN10933+REGN10987 combination therapy
armGroupLabels: With COVID-19 symptoms but not requiring supplemental O2

interventions.name: Placebo
armGroupLabels: With COVID-19 symptoms but not requiring supplemental O2

briefTitle: A Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Gimsilumab in Subjects With Lung Injury or Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome Secondary to COVID-19 (BREATHE)

interventions.name: Gimsilumab
interventions.description: Gimsilumab is a fully human monoclonal antibody (mAb).

interventions.name: Eculizumab
interventions.description: Eculizumab 900-1200 mg will be administered intravenously.

briefTitle: Anti-CD14 Treatment With IC14 in Hospitalized ARDS Patients
conditions: Acute Lung Injury/Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS)

briefTitle: Compassionate Use Open-Label Anti-CD14 Treatment in Patients With SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19)

interventions.name: IC14, a monoclonal antibody against CD14
interventions.description: IC14 is a recombinant chimeric anti-human monoclonal antibody directed against human CD14. It recognizes both membrane-bound CD14 and soluble CD14.

briefTitle: Adrecizumab (HAM8101) to Improve Prognosis and Outcomes in COVID-19 Trial
Mavrilimumab in Severe COVID-19 Pneumonia and Hyper-inflammation (COMBAT-19)

interventions.name: Mavrilimumab
interventions.description: human monoclonal antibody targeting GM-CSF receptor-alpha

briefTitle: A Phase 2 Study of IC14 in Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome

interventions.name: IC14
interventions.description: Blocks CD14 signalling which is responsible for disease pathogenesis in ARDS
